Ok, I think we have that cleared up then. One more comment, just on
autobots generaly: be careful to follow the strength and size limits
and everything. Read the rules for more info.

::Prowl::

Prowl raises an eyebrow, having no idea how this new bot knew who he
was. As far as Prowl could remember, he had never seen this bot in his
life, but he knew who Optimus Prime was, and the fact that this
transformer used to be him, and was still an Autobot, was a good sign.

"Um, ok. I think you picked kinda a bad place to tour this planet,
though, there's a war going on."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Scorpius (No last name)" <scorpiusis@h...> wrote:
> The new transformer looks at Prowl, something about his name makes him 
> think. "It's good to see you again Prowl, the name's Optimal Prime,
I use to 
> be Optimus Prime but I was rebuilt like this after a transwarp
explosion. 
> The wave even affected the matrix shell. And just so you know, I'm
still an 
> Autobot," he informs Prowl.
